prompt.content: Please translate the user message from Arabic to English. Make the translation sound as natural as possible.

tests.name: ar_en_7
tests.input: في بعض المناطق من العالم، تستعمل مستنقعات المنغروف لتربية المحار و الحيوانات البحرية الأخرى.
tests.output: In some parts of the world, mangrove swamps are used to cultivate oysters and other shellfish.
tests.llm_output: In some parts of the world, mangrove swamps are used to cultivate oysters and other marine animals.

tests.name: ar_en_6
tests.input: نسي توم قائمة التسوق الخاصة به ولم يحصل إلا على نصف ما كان ينوي الحصول عليه عندما ذهب للتسوق.
tests.output: Tom forgot his shopping list and only got half of what he had intended to get when he went shopping.
tests.llm_output: Tom forgot his shopping list and only got half of what he intended to get when he went shopping.

tests.name: ar_en_24
tests.input: هناك الكثير من الأشياء التي بإمكانها التّأثير على قدرة المرأ على السّياقة.
tests.output: There are many things that can affect a person's ability to drive.
tests.llm_output: "There are many things that can affect a person's ability to drive."

tests.name: ar_en_40
tests.input: بإمكان ملكة النمل أن تعيش ثلاثين سنة و تلد الملايين من البيضات.
tests.output: A queen ant can live for thirty years and deliver millions of eggs.
tests.llm_output: A queen ant can live for thirty years and lay millions of eggs.

tests.name: ar_en_39
tests.input: ذهب ماثيو إلى الغابة كي يجمع الحطب من أجل إشعال النار في المخيم.
tests.output: Matthew went into the forest to gather firewood for the campfire.
tests.llm_output: Matthew went to the forest to gather firewood for the campfire.

tests.name: ar_en_48
tests.input: لقد تغيّرت الصّين كثيرا منذ 1995 و على الغرب أن يعترف بذلك.
tests.output: China has changed a lot since 1995 and the West has to acknowledge that.
tests.llm_output: China has changed a lot since 1995 and the West should acknowledge that.

tests.name: ar_en_12
tests.input: كان مستنقع المنغروف موطنا للعديد من أنواع أشجار المنغروف و كل نوع كانت له ميزاته الخاصة.
tests.output: The mangrove swamp was home to many different species of mangrove trees, each with its own unique characteristics.
tests.llm_output: The Mangrove swamp was home to many types of mangrove trees, each with its own unique features.

tests.name: ar_en_23
tests.input: حضر كارلوس منعم حفل افتتاح الألعاب الأولمبيّة سنة 1992 في برشلونة، إسبانيا.
tests.output: Carlos Menem attended the opening ceremony of the 1992 Olympics held in Barcelona, Spain.
tests.llm_output: Carlos Menem attended the opening ceremony of the 1992 Olympic Games in Barcelona, Spain.

tests.name: ar_en_30
tests.input: الكثير من الحاخامات يعتقدون أن الديانة اليهودية تتنافى مع الصهيونية.
tests.output: Many rabbis think that Judaism is incompatible with Zionism.
tests.llm_output: Many rabbis believe that Judaism is incompatible with Zionism.

tests.name: ar_en_41
tests.input: أنت تعلم أنّك لا تحتاج لتكون ذكيّا كي تصبح رئيس منظّمة عنصريّة.
tests.output: You know that you don't need to be smart to be the president of a racist organization.
tests.llm_output: "You know that you don't need to be smart to become the leader of a racist organization."

tests.name: ar_en_45
tests.input: في فترة التزاوج، تغني ذكور الحياتان أغاني معقدة لجذب الإناث.
tests.output: During mating season, male whales will sing complex songs to attract females.
tests.llm_output: During mating season, male animals sing complex songs to attract females.

tests.name: ar_en_33
tests.input: الملايين من العراقيين اضطروا للفرار من منازلهم بسبب الغزو الأمريكي.
tests.output: Because of the US invasion, millions of Iraqis were forced to flee their homes.
tests.llm_output: Millions of Iraqis were forced to flee their homes due to the American invasion.

tests.name: ar_en_8
tests.input: في بعض المناطق من العالم، مستنقعات المنغروف مهددة بالزوال بسبب قطع الأشجار و مشاريع التنمية.
tests.output: In some parts of the world, mangrove swamps are threatened by deforestation and development.
tests.llm_output: In some parts of the world, mangrove swamps are threatened with extinction due to deforestation and development projects.

tests.name: ar_en_28
tests.input: يتّهم بعض النّاشطين المغرب بارتكاب تصفية عرقيّة في الصّحراء الغربيّة.
tests.output: Activists accuse Morocco of carrying out ethnic cleansing in Western Sahara.
tests.llm_output: Some activists accuse Morocco of committing ethnic cleansing in Western Sahara.

tests.name: ar_en_21
tests.input: مستنقعات المنغروف نظام بيئي فريد بقع في المناطق التي يلتقي فيها البر بالبحر.
tests.output: Mangrove swamps are a unique ecosystem that exist in areas where the land meets the sea.
tests.llm_output: The mangrove swamps are a unique ecosystem found in areas where land meets the sea.

tests.name: ar_en_27
tests.input: قليلة هي الحشرات التي تصل إلى مستوى معقد من التنظيم كالنمل و الأرضات.
tests.output: Few insects reach the level of complexity as ants and termites.
tests.llm_output: Few insects reach the level of complexity in organization that ants and termites have.

tests.name: ar_en_17
tests.input: مستنقعات المنغروف في منطقة سوندابان في بنغلاداش موطن لببر البنغال المهدد بالانقراض.
tests.output: The mangrove swamps of the Sundarbans in Bangladesh are home to the endangered Bengal tiger.
tests.llm_output: "The mangrove swamps in the Sundarbans region of Bangladesh are home to the endangered Bengal tiger."

tests.name: ar_en_14
tests.input: كانت شبكة القنوات و المجاري المائية لمستنقع المنغروف تمثل نظاما بيئيا مذهلا للاستكشاف.
tests.output: The intricate network of channels and waterways in the mangrove swamp provided a unique and fascinating ecosystem to explore.
tests.llm_output: The network of channels and waterways in the Mangrove swamp represented an amazing ecosystem to explore.

tests.name: ar_en_19
tests.input: يعرف زيري أهمّيّة القدرة على إنهاء وظيفة منزليّة و المرور إلى الوظيفة التّالية.
tests.output: Ziri knows the value of being able to finish a chore and move on to the next.
tests.llm_output: My partner knows the importance of being able to finish a household task and move on to the next one.

tests.name: ar_en_49
tests.input: كان الطابور يتقدم ببطء فقرر زيري أن يشاهد فيلما على هاتفه.
tests.output: The queue was moving so slowly that Ziri decided to watch a movie on his phone.
tests.llm_output: "The line was moving slowly, so Ziry decided to watch a movie on his phone."

tests.name: ar_en_31
tests.input: مستنقعات المنغروف لولاية فلوريدا وهجة مشهورة للسياح و محبي الطبيعة.
tests.output: The mangrove swamps of Florida are a popular destination for tourists and nature enthusiasts.
tests.llm_output: The Mangrove Swamps in Florida are a famous destination for tourists and nature lovers.

tests.name: ar_en_38
tests.input: يأوي النظام البيئي الفريد لمستنقعات المنغروف تنوعا أحيائيا واسعا.
tests.output: The unique ecosystem of the mangrove swamp supports a wide range of biodiversity.
tests.llm_output: The unique ecosystem of the mangrove swamps harbors a wide biological diversity.

tests.name: ar_en_47
tests.input: زيري يكره الحديث مع العجزة لأنه لا يعرف عن ماذا يتحدث معهم.
tests.output: Ziri hates talking to elderly people because he never knows what to talk about with them.
tests.llm_output: My neighbor hates talking to elderly people because he doesn't know what to talk to them about.

tests.name: ar_en_0
tests.input: إن الكلاب السياسية النابحة كأمثال نعيمة صالحي و لخضر بن كولة يحضون بدعم من طرف مسؤولين فاسدين يجندون جيوشا من الذباب الإلكتروني من أجل دعم كلابهم النابحين العنصريين.
tests.output: Political barking dogs like Naima Salhi and Lakhdar Benkoula are sponsored by corrupt officials that are also mobilizing armies of Internet trolls to support their racist barking dogs.
tests.llm_output: "The political barking dogs like Naïma Salhi and Lakhdar Benkoula are being supported by corrupt officials who recruit armies of electronic flies to support their racist barking dogs."

tests.name: ar_en_9
tests.input: النظام البيئي للغابات المطرية في تنوع أحيائي ثري و يأوي الكثير من الأنواع المهددة بالانقراض.
tests.output: The rainforest ecosystem is rich in biodiversity and is home to many endangered species.
tests.llm_output: The ecosystem of rainforests is rich in biodiversity and harbors many endangered species.

tests.name: ar_en_29
tests.input: تحدث زيري عن الصعوبات التي يعيشها الفلسطينيون في الضفة الغربية و غزة.
tests.output: Ziri spoke about the hardships endured by the Palestinians in the West Bank and Gaza.
tests.llm_output: Zeri talked about the difficulties that Palestinians are facing in the West Bank and Gaza.

tests.name: ar_en_36
tests.input: قاموا بتنظيم إفطار جماعي لمعتنقي الإسلام في اليوم الأول من رمضان.
tests.output: They organized an iftar event for converts on the first day of Ramadan.
tests.llm_output: "They organized a group iftar for new Muslims on the first day of Ramadan."

tests.name: ar_en_43
tests.input: يتمتع والدي بخبرة كبيرة في الحياة ، وأنا دائمًا أتبع نصيحته.
tests.output: My dad has got so much experience in life, and I always follow his advice.
tests.llm_output: "My father has a great deal of life experience, and I always follow his advice."

tests.name: ar_en_22
tests.input: كانت الصحراء الكبرى فسيفساءا من الأنهار و المستنقعات في عصور ما قبل التاريخ.
tests.output: In prehistory, Sahara was a patchwork of rivers and swamps.
tests.llm_output: The Sahara was a mosaic of rivers and swamps in prehistoric times.

tests.name: ar_en_15
tests.input: توفر الجذور الغليظة لأشجار المنغروف ملجأ آمنا و مكانا للتكاثر للعديد من أنواع الأسماك.
tests.output: The thick mangrove roots of the swamp provide shelter and breeding grounds for many species of fish.
tests.llm_output: The thick roots of mangrove trees provide a safe haven and breeding ground for many species of fish.

tests.name: ar_en_18
tests.input: مستنقع المنغروف مكان هادئ و مناسب لممارسة رياضة الكاياك و الرياضات المائية الأخرى.
tests.output: The mangrove swamp provided a tranquil and peaceful environment for kayaking and other water sports.
tests.llm_output: "Mangrove swamp is a calm and suitable place for practicing kayaking and other water sports."

tests.name: ar_en_20
tests.input: بعض المناطق الرطبة مثل مستنقعات المنغروف تحمي السواحل من العواصف و الانجراف.
tests.output: Some wetlands, such as mangrove swamps, provide important coastal protection against storms and erosion.
tests.llm_output: Some wetland areas, such as mangrove swamps, protect the coasts from storms and erosion.

tests.name: ar_en_5
tests.input: كان مستنقع المنغروف مكانا مشهورا عند مراقبي الطيور حيث كانوا يراقبون فيه العديد من أنواع الطيور.
tests.output: The mangrove swamp was a popular spot for birdwatchers, as many different species of birds could be seen there.
tests.llm_output: The Mangrove Swamp was a famous spot among birdwatchers where they used to observe many types of birds.

tests.name: ar_en_46
tests.input: تعلم أنّك لست مضطرّا كي تكون ذكيّا كي تصبح رئيس تنظيم عنصري.
tests.output: You know that you don't need to be smart to be the president of a racist organization.
tests.llm_output: You don't have to be intelligent to become the leader of a racist organization.

tests.name: ar_en_3
tests.input: كان مستنقع المنغروف ذاك يعج بالحياة، حيث كانت تعيش فيه حيوانات مختلفة، من بينها السلطعونات و الجمبري و الثعابين و السحليات.
tests.output: The mangrove swamp was teeming with life, from crabs and shrimp to snakes and lizards.
tests.llm_output: The Mangrove swamp was full of life, where different animals lived, including crabs, shrimps, snakes, and lizards.

tests.name: ar_en_10
tests.input: أدرَكْنَا أنَّهُم كانواْ صَحِيحاً وَلَم نُملِكْ مَكاناً لِلَّعْبِ أو حَتَّى لِلتَّمَرُّنِ.
tests.output: We realised they were right: we had nowhere to play or even practise.
tests.llm_output: We realized that they were right and we didn't have a place to play or even practice.

tests.name: ar_en_13
tests.input: أشجار المنغروف مكيفة للعيش في المياه المالحة، لذا فهي تستطيع العيش في المناطق الساحلية.
tests.output: The mangrove trees in the swamp are adapted to living in salty water, which is why they are able to survive in coastal areas.
tests.llm_output: "Mangrove trees are adapted to live in salty water, so they can survive in coastal areas."

tests.name: ar_en_16
tests.input: ليس على العالم التوقف في شهر رمضان. المسلمون يقومون بأعمالهم المعتادة أثناء صيامهم.
tests.output: The world doesn't have to stop because of Ramadan. Muslims work their normal jobs while they're fasting.
tests.llm_output: The world doesn't stop during Ramadan. Muslims continue with their usual activities while fasting.

tests.name: ar_en_4
tests.input: كان الغطاء النباتي الكثيف لمستنقعات المنغروف يوفر ملاذ آمنا للحيوانات الصغيرة التي تفر من المفترسين.
tests.output: The dense vegetation of the mangrove swamp provided excellent cover for small animals trying to evade predators.
tests.llm_output: The dense vegetation cover of the mangrove swamps provided a safe haven for small animals fleeing from predators.

tests.name: ar_en_34
tests.input: كان الأطفال يهربون واحدا واحدا من الغابة و يقولون أنّهم رأوا دبّا.
tests.output: The kids, one by one, came running out of the woods, saying that they had seen a bear.
tests.llm_output: The children were running away one by one from the forest and saying that they saw a bear.

tests.name: ar_en_44
tests.input: مستنقعات المنغروف موطن أساسي للكثير من الحيوانات و النباتات.
tests.output: The mangrove swamps along the coast provide critical habitats for many species of animals and plants.
tests.llm_output: The Mangrove swamps are a primary habitat for many animals and plants.

tests.name: ar_en_35
tests.input: علينا أن نكشف تستّر الحكومة بشأن ظاهرة الأجسام الطّائرة المجهولة.
tests.output: We need to expose the government cover-up of the UFO phenomenon.
tests.llm_output: We need to uncover the government's cover-up regarding the phenomenon of unidentified flying objects.

tests.name: ar_en_1
tests.input: ما قتلته الحروب الصّليبيّة من اليهود و شرّدوه منهم في ما كان سيُعرف في ما بعد بفلسطين أكبر من ما قتلوه الصّليبيّون من اليهود في أوروبا.
tests.output: The Crusades killed and displaced even more Jews from what had by then become known as Palestine, at the same time as Crusaders killed many European Jews.
tests.llm_output: The number of Jews killed and displaced by the Crusades in what would later be known as Palestine was greater than the number killed by the Crusaders in Europe.

tests.name: ar_en_11
tests.input: الإنسان، إذا لم يكن الأكبر، فبالتأكيد هو أخطر الحيوانات المفترسة. إنه يقتل من أجل المتعة.
tests.output: Man, if he is not the largest, is certainly the most dangerous of ferocious animals. He kills for pleasure.
tests.llm_output: "If it's not the biggest, then surely humans are the most dangerous predators. They kill for pleasure."

tests.name: ar_en_2
tests.input: تأوي مستنقعات المنغروف في الغابات المطرية للأمازون تنوعا أحيائيا كبيرا و من الحيوانات التي تعيش هناك، يوجد اليغور و ثعبان الأناكوندا.
tests.output: The mangrove swamps of the Amazon rainforest are home to a diverse array of wildlife, including jaguars and anacondas.
tests.llm_output: The mangrove swamps in the Amazon rainforests provide a great diversity of wildlife habitats, and among the animals that live there are the jaguar and the anaconda snake.

tests.name: ar_en_37
tests.input: يعطي التانين الموجود في مستنقعات المنغروف الماء لونا بنيا متميزا.
tests.output: The tannins in the water of the mangrove swamp give it a distinct brownish color.
tests.llm_output: The two types of algae present in the mangrove swamps give the water a distinctive brown color.

tests.name: ar_en_26
tests.input: تساهم مستنقعات المنغروف في حماية السواحل من العواصف و الكوارث الطبيعية.
tests.output: Mangrove swamps can help to protect coastal areas from storm surges and other natural disasters.
tests.llm_output: "Mangrove swamps contribute to protecting the coasts from storms and natural disasters."

tests.name: ar_en_42
tests.input: عرض أحدهم منديلا على ريمة و حين رفعت رأسها لترى من، رأت زيري.
tests.output: Someone offered his handkerchief and when Rima looked up, it was Ziri.
tests.llm_output: Someone offered a handkerchief to Reema, and when she lifted her head to see who it was, she saw Ziry.

tests.name: ar_en_32
tests.input: تلعب مستنقعات المنغروف أيضا دور مصافي تطهر الماء من المواد الملوثة.
tests.output: Mangrove swamps can also act as natural filters, helping to clean the water of pollutants.
tests.llm_output: Mangrove swamps also play a role in purifying water from pollutants, in addition to their other ecological functions.

tests.name: ar_en_25
tests.input: العديد من أنواع البرمائيات لديها اماكن تكاثر خاصة كالأحواض و المستنقعات.
tests.output: Many amphibian species will breed in specific breeding grounds, such as shallow ponds or marshes.
tests.llm_output: Many types of amphibians have special breeding places such as ponds and swamps.
